Packages 
Package Description
timeclock
Contains the main method and the GUI components for the application.
timeclock.crypto
Contains classes that provide cryptography for password protection.
timeclock.data
Contains classes that interface with the JavaDB embedded database.
timeclock.objects
Contains the data objects used in the application, Employee and TimePunch.
timeclock.reports
Contains classes that create reports using iText.
timeclock.utilities
Contains helper utility classes.
timeclock.workers
Contains all of the SwingWorker classes used by the TimeClock GUI.
